mapper.sql: id, role_name, label, sort_no, data_state, create_time, update_time, remark, create_by, update_by, data_scope
mapper.select:
select from zzyl.sys_role
and role_name like concat('%',#{roleName},'%')
order by create_time desc
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sys_role (role_name, label, sort_no, data_state, create_time, update_time, remark, create_by, update_by, data_scope) values (#{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataState,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dataScope,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update sys_role
role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort_no = #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
data_state = #{dataState,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
data_scope = #{dataScope,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_role set role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort_no = #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_state = #{dataState,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, data_scope = #{dataScope,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_role (role_name, label, sort_no, data_state, create_time, update_time, remark, create_by, update_by, data_scope) values
(#{item.roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dataState,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.dataScope,jdbcType=CHAR})
